events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't been updated for several days, and I'm very concerned about the delay in delivery.
The customer's report contains keywords related to delivery delay; the case is categorized accordingly for further handling.
The case has been assigned to the deliveries support team to investigate the delay and provide updates to the customer as soon as possible.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the delay with your shipment. Let me look into this for you right away.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address so I can track your package more precisely and offer an update?
Sure, my order number is 789654123, and the shipping address is 1234 Elm Street, Springfield. I would appreciate any information you can provide.

Thank you for the details. Our carrier reports a delay due to unforeseen circumstances. We expect the package to arrive within the next 3 business days. We will monitor the shipment closely and update you accordingly.
I understand delays happen; thank you for the update. I hope it arrives soon as I need it urgently, but I appreciate your assistance and monitoring.
We are pleased to confirm your package has been delivered. Please check your mailbox or front porch for the parcel, and do let us know if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to ensure your delivery was received in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay issue.
As we have not received any further concerns, we are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need more help in the future.
